title.narrative: 2014 Management Project - Secondary Education and Transferable Skills: Evidence Gap Map and Round Table

description.narrative: The project will provide The MasterCard Foundation and other actors in the education space with a strong understanding of the state of evidence on the impact of transferable skills programming in low and middle-income countries. The core activity of the project is the production of an Evidence Gap Map, which will serve as the basis for a white paper, an expert roundtable, and a final report.

participating-org.narrative: International Initiative for Impact Evaluation, Inc. (3ie)
